abstract: NFL Roundup; Cleveland Browns will likely release quarterback Johnny Manziel, who is under NFL review for domestic violence for second time since October 2015; other football news noted.

headline.print_headline: Manziel’s Ex-Girlfriend Told Police That He Hit Her
headline.main: Johnny Manziel’s Ex-Girlfriend Told Police That He Hit Her

snippet: A police report provided the first details of the altercation in Texas between Manziel, a Browns quarterback, and Colleen Crowley. Two departments have closed their cases on the episode.
lead_paragraph: A police report provided the first details of the altercation in Texas between Manziel, a Browns quarterback, and Colleen Crowley. Two departments have closed their cases on the episode.
